sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you put <radical>two</radical> <radical>two</radical> pound weights on a <radical>person</radical> on the <radical>moon</radical> they'll increase in <kanji>stature</kanji> when they come back down. Everything is lighter on the moon so the person won't even feel the weights. Then when they come back to earth they'll have grown a whole two inches taller!
meaningInfo: Imagine how much height you'd gain if you spent time lifting weights on the moon!
readingMnemonic: Getting a taller <kanji>stature</kanji> will also make you seem super <reading>sexy</reading> (<ja>せき</ja>) on the moon and back home on earth. If you stay on the moon long enough, you'll be the tallest person in the galaxy and who wouldn't find that sexy?! Huh?
readingInfo: Imagine how sexy the height of a ten foot tall person would be after just coming back from weight training on the moon.
